jumper.name: J3_2V5
jumper.description: value=true will configure GPIO header to run at 2.5V

jumper.name: J3_3V3
jumper.description: value=true will configure GPIO header to run at 3.3V.

interface.name: ddr3_a_sdram
interface.description: DDR3 board interface, it can use MIG IP for connection.

interface.name: ddr3_b_sdram
interface.description: DDR3 board interface, it can use MIG IP for connection.

interface.name: sfp_a_iic
interface.description: Secondary interface for SFP A to communicate with SFP module.

interface.name: sfp_b_iic
interface.description: Secondary interface for SFP B to communicate with SFP module.

component.name: push_buttons_2bits
component.description: Push Buttons K2, K3, Active Low

component.name: push_buttons_3bits
component.description: Push Buttons K2, K3, K4, Active Low

component.name: led_a_8bits
component.description: LEDs QSPI side, 7 to 0, Active Low

component.name: led_b_8bits
component.description: LEDs Power side, 7 to 0, Active Low

component.name: rs232_uart
component.description: USB-to-UART Bridge, which allows a connection to a host computer with a USB port

component.name: sysclk_100
component.description: 2.5V LVDS differential 100 MHz oscillator used as system differential clock on the board

component.name: sysclk_133
component.description: 2.5V LVDS differential 133 MHz oscillator used as system differential clock on the board

component.name: spi_flash
component.description: 256Mb (32MB) of nonvolatile storage that can be used for configuration or data storage

component.name: phy_sfp_a
component.description: PHY outside the board connected through sfp

component_mode.name: sfp_a_clk_a_156
component_mode.description: SERDES fixed 1000BaseX interface with 156.25MHZ MGT Clock

component_mode.name: sfp_a_clk_a_125
component_mode.description: SERDES fixed 1000BaseX interface with 125MHz MGT Clock

component_mode.name: sfp_a_sgmii_clk_a_156
component_mode.display_name: SFP A SGMII using 156.25MHz MGT Clock

component_mode.name: sfp_a_sgmii_clk_a_125
component_mode.display_name: SFP A SGMII using 125MHz MGT Clock

component.name: phy_sfp_b
component.description: PHY outside the board connected through sfp

component_mode.name: sfp_b_clk_a_156
component_mode.description: SERDES fixed 1000BaseX interface with 156.25MHZ MGT Clock

component_mode.name: sfp_b_clk_a_125
component_mode.description: SERDES fixed 1000BaseX interface with 125MHz MGT Clock

component_mode.name: sfp_b_clk_b_125
component_mode.description: SERDES fixed 1000BaseX interface with 125MHz MGT Clock

component_mode.name: sfp_b_sgmii_clk_a_156
component_mode.display_name: SFP B SGMII using 156.25MHz MGT Clock

component_mode.name: sfp_b_sgmii_clk_a_125
component_mode.display_name: SFP B SGMII using 125MHz MGT Clock
